content: Medical device maker Teleflex Inc said on Tuesday it would buy privately held NeoTract Inc in its second billion-dollar deal in the past nine months  to strengthen its portfolio of urology devices.
name: Teleflex Incorporated
title: Device maker Teleflex boosts urology business with NeoTract buy

content: * Teleflex sees mid-single digits sales bump going forward (Adds conference call details  analyst comment  shares)
name: Teleflex Incorporated
title: UPDATE 3-Device maker Teleflex boosts urology business with NeoTract buy

content: * Teleflex Inc - ‍Teleflex will acquire NeoTract in a transaction valued up to $1.1 billion​
name: Teleflex Incorporated
title: BRIEF-Teleflex Inc to acquire NeoTract for up to $1.1 bln​

content: Sept 5 Medical technologies provider Teleflex Inc said on Tuesday it would buy privately-held NeoTract Inc in a deal valued at up to $1.1 billion.
name: Teleflex Incorporated
title: Medical tech provider Teleflex to buy NeoTract in $1.1 bln deal
